verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: tossed] [ARG1: Starburst candies] [ARG2: to German Chancellor Angela Merkel] [ARGM-TMP: during his tense meeting with Group of Seven ( G-7 ) leaders weeks ago] , Eurasia Group President Ian Bremmer said Wednesday .

[ARG1: President Trump reportedly tossed Starburst candies to German Chancellor Angela Merkel during his tense meeting with Group of Seven ( G-7 ) leaders weeks ago] , [ARG0: Eurasia Group President Ian Bremmer] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] .
